author: .fjl
content:
Geth v1.10.18 (Sharblu) is released! The Merge (PoS transition) is enabled for the Ropsten testnet in this release. There are also many updates related to EVM tracing.

- https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/releases/tag/v1.10.18
- https://twitter.com/go_ethereum/status/1529462663159373824
- https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/uxhvig/geth_v11018_sharblu_is_released_pos_transition/
